course_title: SEM: Gender, Sexuality, and the Law
course_description: This course examines the treatment of gender and sexuality under US law. We will examine a range of issues, beginning with a historical overview of women and the law, and the history of gay rights. The course will cover legal changes in the wake of rising sexual and gender liberty, and examine how the law constructs sexuality and gender identity.
sections: Class Nbr: This section is full 5604, Section #: 001, Type: SEM, Campus: ATL, Meets: Th 2-4p, Instructor: A. Samandari, Status: Closed
